    • Method Detail

      • convertJSONtoXML

        public void convertJSONtoXML(java.io.File json,
                             java.io.File xml)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads in the JSON from the given file and outputs the data, converted to XML, to the given file. Exceptions are thrown by this method so that the caller can clean up the before exiting. Uses Utilities class to read/write to file, read JSON and convert to XML.
        Specified by:
        convertJSONtoXML in interface XMLJSONConverterI
        Parameters:
        json - File from which to read JSON data.
        xml - File from which to write XML data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
